- 'Born on the Fourth of July' - a biographical film about Ron Kovic, a paralyzed Vietnam War veteran turned political activist against injustice.
- 'The Equalizer' - a crime drama film about James Wilcox, an ex-military police officer who becomes involved in the world of organized crime after being laid off by his employer due to budget cuts.
- 'Gran Torino' - a crime drama film about Clint Eastwood, an actor known for his roles in Western films. In this film, he plays as Harry Callahan, a Korean War veteran turned illegal activities boss who sets out to redeem himself and the boy he comes across.
- 'Titanic' - a romantic disaster film about James Cameron, a filmmaker known for his work in science fiction and animation. In this film, he works with computer graphics techniques and special effects makeup to create a realistic depiction of the ill-fated R. M. S. Titanic.
